description:
strconv: faster Unquote in common case

Also reject literal newline in " and ' quoted strings.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM if you take out the snark

http://codereview.appspot.com/5139045/diff/2001/src/pkg/strconv/quote_test.go
File src/pkg/strconv/quote_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5139045/diff/2001/src/pkg/strconv/quote_test.go#newcode217
src/pkg/strconv/quote_test.go:217: Unquote(`"how can you write a large system without c++?"`)
please choose a less inflammatory sentence.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=bcebaf66e7a8 ***

strconv: faster Unquote in common case

Also reject literal newline in " and ' quoted strings.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5139045
I forgot that `` strings were already handled earlier.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5139045/diff/3/src/pkg/strconv/quote.go
File src/pkg/strconv/quote.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5139045/diff/3/src/pkg/strconv/quote.go#newcode292
src/pkg/strconv/quote.go:292: switch quote {
what's this switch for? or maybe you meant to write a default.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

subject: code review 5139045: strconv: faster Unquote in common case
